scoreItems.name: SPF Record Present
scoreItems.description: SPF TXT record exists on the domain (with correct v=spf1). If missing, domain is unprotected by SPF.

scoreItems.name: Single SPF Record
scoreItems.description: Only one SPF record is published (no duplicates). Multiple records cause SPF failure.

scoreItems.name: SPF Syntax Valid
scoreItems.description: SPF record is syntactically correct (no obvious errors, unrecognized mechanisms, or syntax violations).

scoreItems.name: Authorized Sources â‰¤ 10 Lookups
scoreItems.description: SPF includes/redirects do not exceed 10 DNS lookups. (Staying within RFC limit avoids permerror.)

scoreItems.name: No "Pass All" Mechanism
scoreItems.description: SPF does not use +all which would allow any sender.

scoreItems.name: All Mechanism Policy
scoreItems.description: SPF uses an appropriate policy on "all": -all (hard fail) configured: 5 points (strict enforcement). ~all (soft fail): 3 points (partial credit, more relaxed). ?all or no all: 0 (neutral or missing policy is poor).

scoreItems.name: No Deprecated Mechanisms
scoreItems.description: SPF record does not use deprecated mechanisms like ptr. (If none, give 2 points; if present, 0.)

scoreItems.name: DKIM Implemented
scoreItems.description: At least one DKIM public key record is published for the domain.

scoreItems.name: DKIM Key Length
scoreItems.description: Strength of DKIM keys in DNS: 2048-bit (or higher): 5 points. 1024-bit: 3 points. <1024-bit: 0.

scoreItems.name: DKIM Multiple Selectors
scoreItems.description: Domain has at least two DKIM selectors/keys set up (facilitates key rotation).

scoreItems.name: No DKIM Test Mode
scoreItems.description: DKIM DNS records are in normal mode (no t=y flags set, indicating no lingering test-mode).

scoreItems.name: DMARC Record Present
scoreItems.description: DMARC TXT record found at _dmarc.domain. If missing, that's a major gap.

scoreItems.name: DMARC Policy Enforcement
scoreItems.description: The strictness of the DMARC policy (p=): reject=10, quarantine=8, none=3.

scoreItems.name: DMARC Coverage for Subdomains
scoreItems.description: Subdomain policy in place (sp=) and not weaker than p, or not needed.
scoreItems.details: No subdomain policy set or not needed

scoreItems.name: DMARC Alignment Mode
scoreItems.description: Alignment setting (aspf/adkim): 2 points if relaxed (default) or strict, 0 if misconfigured.

scoreItems.name: DMARC Reporting (RUA)
scoreItems.description: Aggregate reporting address (rua) is specified to receive feedback.

scoreItems.name: DMARC Policy Percentage
scoreItems.description: If a policy is enforced (quarantine/reject), check that pct is 100 (full coverage).
